channel.title: Creeper Explosions [VOTE]
channel.description:
[quote="Moparisthebest, post:34, topic:402753"][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=499809.msg3656484#msg3656484 date=1310060930] But seriously, can we enable creeper explosions? [/quote]
Put it to a vote![/quote]
Sorry David, I decided to make the poll.
[hr]
Enable creeper explosions so that they actually deal damage to blocks?
Please place a vote and your opinion here!
Remember, your vote only counts if you post an opinion, otherwise, we don't care what you think. :|

item.title: Creeper Explosions [VOTE]
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

the respawn rate has increased, my brother had a pack of creepers that blow up on him. lol i was going to say on the older servers i hardly remember creepers then im like oh ya they were turned off. but anyway other mobs were not too common at least where i was. on this server when its night or storming mobs are everywhere. no joke. if creepers are enabled i see holes everywhere. im for keeping the creeps how they are, but its not going to effect me too much if they are enabled.

Read full topic

Not much we can do about it, they’re part of the game, and this isn’t a creative server. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder ;D[/quote]
So lets break all of the abandoned houses?

item.title: Creeper Explosions [VOTE]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:64, topic:402970”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=500032.msg3661167#msg3661167 date=1310355691]
It’s not even personal building and stuff being destroyed I have a problem with, it’s the natural landscape, I just can’t fill in holes in the side of hills and make them look right again.
[/quote] yeah its not your responsibility to fix holes in hills >:O. it takes 4 seconds for anyone… just dig durt and melt cobble and they should fix it themselfs!!![/quote]
The creepers should fix it themselves? That’s how it works now!

I’m saying when I come across one, I like to fix it so it looks nice again, and I’m not that good at it.

Read full topic

item.title: Creeper Explosions [VOTE]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

That’s where we have differing opinions, I love the rush I get knowing that if I fail, part of my property will be gone (temporarily of course)

Read full topic

item.title: Creeper Explosions [VOTE]
item.dc:creator: @PuppyClubber PuppyClubber
item.description:
@PuppyClubber wrote:

I don’t want to play on a creative server, I like having to run from the bad things and avoid creeper explosions so they don’t kill me. I don’t quite see how allowing a creeper to blow a chunk of my house up (if I just happen to be that close to the house when it happens) makes the game more of a “challenge” and “require more skill”. It kind of just makes it more annoying. So continuing to say “we should just play on a creative server” is not only becoming annoyingly repetitive, but also irrelevant and ignorant.

Read full topic

item.title: Creeper Explosions [VOTE]
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

I believe the creepers should be allowed to destroy stuff, Just for what the game is about, Yes its a building game but you are suppose to build stuff then protect your self a night from monsters and a creeper being a monster that destroys stuff should be there as well, Just to test how well built something is.

Read full topic

item.description:
